si.title: කාර් වෙනුවට මංගල බඩවැල්
body_lines: අධික වර්ෂාව හේතුවෙන් කළුතර පාරේ අධික වර්ෂාව හේතුවෙන් අලුත විවාහ වූ යුවළක් දුරු කරන ලද සිද්ධිය වාර්තා වී තිබේ.
අයහපත් කාලගුණය සමඟ ඔවුන් මංගල මෝටර් රථය වෙනුවට මාත්රාව භාවිතා කර ඇත.
இதை பார்த்த சிலர் அவர்களை கேலி செய்து வரும் நிலையில் , எந்த ஒரு சூழ்நிலையும் தாங்கும், துணிச்சல் மிக்க பொருத்தமான ஜோடி என கூறி பலரும் வாழ்த்து தெரிவித்துள்ளனர்.
කළුතර, පුලතිව්රෑම්, මතුරාවල සහ වෙනත් ප්රාදේශීය ලේකම් කාර්යාලවල වීදි වීදිවල සඳහන් කිරීම ද වටී.

en.title: Wedding gutter instead of car
body_lines: The incident in which a newlywed couple was brought to Dhoni due to heavy rains have been reported in the Kalutara road due to heavy rains.
With the inclement weather, they have used the dose instead of the wedding car.
While some who saw this, they were ridiculed, many people congratulated them as a brave couple, bearing any situation.
It is also worth noting that the streets of Kalutara, Pulathsingha, Mathurawala and other Divisional Secretariats have been submerged.

summary_lines: Newlyweds use tuk-tuk instead of car due to floods. Some mock, others praise their adaptability. Heavy rains submerge roads in Kalutara district.
